title: MORSHID styling polish: nav active/hover, consistent buttons, standardized cards, alternating section backgrounds

requirements.summary: Polish header nav links: active route highlighted in #25D366 and underline on hover without changing structure/labels/paths.
acceptanceCriteria: On each route (/ , /for-farmers , /contact), exactly one corresponding nav link is visually highlighted using #25D366.
Hovering any nav link shows a visible underline effect (in addition to any existing hover color), and the underline effect works on desktop browsers.
No changes are made to navigation labels (Home, For Farmers, Contact) or their target paths.

file_operations.description: Update nav Link class styling to (1) render active link text color using exactly #25D366 and (2) add an underline-on-hover effect (e.g., underline + offset) while preserving existing structure, labels, and destinations. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make button styling consistent site-wide: rounded corners + shadow on hover for all buttons/links-as-buttons, without modifying frontend/src/components/ui.
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons across Home, For Farmers, Contact, and the floating WhatsApp button have rounded corners (where applicable) and show a shadow effect on hover.
No files under frontend/src/components/ui are modified.
Button text, destinations (href/to), and existing layout/spacing are preserved.

file_operations.description: Enhance the shadcn-ui-based MorshidButton wrapper to enforce a consistent hover shadow (and keep rounded corners) across all button usages, including asChild links. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add global button styling rules (outside frontend/src/components/ui) to ensure non-MorshidButton buttons (e.g., any native <button> rendered by other components) also get rounded corners and a hover shadow, while preserving spacing and existing typography/colors. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Confirm/adjust floating WhatsApp button classes so it conforms to the same hover-shadow behavior and keeps its rounded shape, without changing link destination or layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Standardize card styling across pages: white background, light shadow, rounded corners, and themed colored top border while preserving existing theme colors.
acceptanceCriteria: All card-like UI elements on Home, For Farmers, and Contact render with a white background, light shadow, and rounded corners.
All cards display a colored top border; cards with an existing theme color retain that theme color for the top border (e.g., blue/orange/brown where already used).

file_operations.description: Update the shadcn-ui-based MorshidCard wrapper so the default card appearance is standardized (white background, light shadow, rounded corners) while preserving existing topBorderColor behavior and allowing per-page theme colors (blue/orange/brown/green) to remain intact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adjust any card-like elements not fully covered by MorshidCard (e.g., FAQ accordion item wrappers) to match the standardized card styling (white bg, light shadow, rounded corners, with a top border where applicable) without changing copy or layout structure. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Alternate major section backgrounds across pages using only white, #F5F5F5, and #E8F5E9 without changing copy/images/links/order.
acceptanceCriteria: Across Home, For Farmers, and Contact pages, adjacent major sections do not all share the same background; backgrounds alternate using only white, #F5F5F5, and #E8F5E9.
The existing section order, section content, and all links remain unchanged.
The specified hex values (#F5F5F5 and #E8F5E9) are used exactly where those backgrounds are applied.

file_operations.description: Update Home page section container background styling so adjacent major sections alternate between white, #F5F5F5, and #E8F5E9 (using the exact hex values where applied), while preserving section order, all copy, links, and the existing hero image usage. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update For Farmers page section backgrounds to alternate between white, #F5F5F5, and #E8F5E9 (exact hex values where applied), without changing section order, content, or links. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adjust Contact page background styling to align with the alternating palette (white, #F5F5F5, #E8F5E9) without introducing new sections, changing existing content, or altering non-green theme accents (e.g., the email blue). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
